title: MAS
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Upscale tapas bar at Hotel Andaluz in downtown. Gets busy, so reserve ahead. Reported the following are vegan suitable: vegetarian paella; olives, grapes & garlic; fried brussels sprouts w/ romesco; tofu skewer, Moroccan peanut-coconut sauce, red cabbage slaw. A few other items can be requested vegan like the mezze, grilled artichokes, grilled asparagus and broccoli. Or call ahead, and kitchen will make something to suit.
